thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 07 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Founder Securities Studying Stake Holding Adjustment In JV Credit Suisse Founder Securities, Clarifying Media Reports

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Founder Securities Studying Stake Holding Adjustment In JV Credit Suisse Founder Securities, Clarifying Media Reports

organizations.name: founder securities studying stake holding adjustment in jv credit suisse founder securities

text:
May 7 (Reuters) - Founder Securities Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT IS STUDYING STAKE HOLDING ADJUSTMENT IN ITS JV CREDIT SUISSE FOUNDER SECURITIES LTD, CLARIFYING MEDIA REPORTS
* SAYS CONCERNING PARTIES ARE SEEKING ADVICES FROM STATE ASSETS REGULATOR AND RELATED REGULATORY BODIES REGARDING STAKE HOLDING CHANGES IN ITS JV Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2roWYJm (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our
